competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Major threat with GitHub acquisition (2018), Azure DevOps, Microsoft 365 suite

competitors.name: GitLab
competitors.notes: DevSecOps platform for software development lifecycle

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Source code hosting platform owned by Microsoft

competitors.name: Asana
competitors.notes: Work orchestration platform, top competitor for project management

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: Block-based editor with database capabilities, direct competitor to Confluence

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Digital workflow and enterprise operations platform

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Google Workspace for collaboration and productivity

context: By 2020, Atlassian faced intensified competition from Microsoft, which had acquired GitHub in 2018. New challenger Notion emerged as a competitor to Confluence. COVID-19 pandemic accelerated remote work trends.
